  (INTJ (WRB Why)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD Walked)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (DT the)
            (NAC (NN Way)
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (DT the) (NNP Wok) (NNP My))))
            (NN mum))
          (VP (VBZ has) (RB not)
            (VP (VBN bought)
              (UCP
                (NP
                  (NP (DT a) (NN wok))
                  (PP (IN for)
                    (NP (DT the) (JJ last) (CD 30) (NNS years))))
                (CC or)
                (ADVP (RB so))))))))
    (. .)))

    (, ,)))

                (NP (JJ fatty) (JJ acid) (NNS chains))

                  (WHNP (WDT which))

                          (VP (TO to)

      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP have)
        (VP (VBN tried)
          (S
            (VP (VBG cooking)
              (NP
                (NP (DT all) (NNS sorts))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (NN stuff))))
              (PP (IN like)
                (NP
                  (NP (NNP Hor) (NNP Fun))
                  (CC and)
                  (NP (NNS eggs)))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP it))
      (ADVP (RB really))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (VP (VBG non-stick)
          (NP
            (NP (JJS most))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (DT the) (NN time)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(tried-3, I-1)
aux(tried-3, have-2)
root(ROOT-0, tried-3)
xcomp(tried-3, cooking-4)
det(sorts-6, all-5)
dobj(cooking-4, sorts-6)
prep(sorts-6, of-7)
pobj(of-7, stuff-8)
prep(cooking-4, like-9)
nn(Fun-11, Hor-10)
pobj(like-9, Fun-11)
cc(Fun-11, and-12)
conj(Fun-11, eggs-13)
cc(tried-3, and-14)
nsubj(non-stick-18, it-15)
advmod(non-stick-18, really-16)
aux(non-stick-18, is-17)
conj(tried-3, non-stick-18)
dobj(non-stick-18, most-19)
prep(most-19, of-20)
det(time-22, the-21)
pobj(of-20, time-22)

  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (NN something))
      (VP (VBZ does)
        (VP (VB stick)))
      (, ,))))

aux(stick-4, does-3)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (MD can)
      (ADVP (RB simply))
      (VP
        (VP (VB turn)
          (PRT (RP down))
          (NP (DT the) (NN heat)))
        (CC and)
        (VP (VB scrape)
          (NP (PRP it))
          (PRT (RP off))
          (PP (IN with)
            (NP (DT a) (NN spatula))))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NN durability))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (DT the) (NN carbon) (NN steel))))
    (VP (VBZ means)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (MD can)
            (VP (VB use)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NN edge))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (PRP$ my) (NN wok) (NN stand))))
              (PP (IN as)
                (NP (DT a) (NN fulcrum)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB toss)
                        (NP (PRP$ my) (NN food))
                        (ADVP (RB quickly))
                        (PP (IN over)
                          (NP (JJ high) (NN heat)))
                        (PP (IN without)
                          (NP
                            (NP (NN fear))
                            (PP (IN of)
                              (S
                                (VP (VBG damaging)
                                  (NP
                                    (NP (DT the) (NN bottom))
                                    (PP (IN of)
                                      (NP (DT the) (NN wok)))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

aux(toss-21, to-20)

poss(food-23, my-22)
